Headline: Red, Purple and Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red, Purple and Yellow Line trains are running with residual delays due to signal problems near the area of Howard. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red, Purple and Yellow Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier signal problems near the area of Howard.

Board/Exit Red & Purple line train on the Purple Line platform

Board/Exit Yellow Line trains on 95th bound platform

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
